relationships.name: Chen Xiaodao
relationships.type: Doctor-patient relationship (once performed an emergency surgery on Chen Xiaodao)

relationships.name: Lin Xiu
relationships.type: Professional aversion (Su Mingyue dislikes gambling addicts)

events.details: Chen Xiaodao secretly observes while officially helping set up medical equipment, noting temporal stabilizer's interface patterns match ship's laundry system
consequences: Chen recognizes control sequence from crew training
Prepares backup plan using service elevator access

events.details: Su Mingyue treats Chen's temporal burns, realizing his unique sensitivity could be key to stabilizing the ship
consequences: Joint plan formed to use Chen as temporal anchor
Seven-day countdown now visible on Chen's skin
